review_blob: Decent beer.  It quinches your thirst just like water... which is kind of funny because that is what it taste like.  I would say this is the best cheap domestic beer out in the market.

For being such a cheap beer it is actually not that bad.  It is great beer for a weekend bender.  You can drink quite a few and not have to worry about those tiresome headaches.  In all seriousiness, for a cheap water downed beer you could do a lot worse
I guess the taste is what is to be expected for a beer that is associated with Cubs baseball... bad and flat.  It is best used to grill brats with.  It does get extra points for its cheapness.

I drink as much "American" beer as I can but I dont think I will giving this swill another try.  If you dont care about taste (or your taste buds), then please go ahead and give this a try.  It had a metallic taste... and I was drinking it from the tap.  All that I need to say that this is the pride of MN.

I absolutely love this beer.  This beer is by far the beer of "perfect pours".   I dont need really need to describe this beer... all  I have to say is perfection.  Best to have in the morning, afternoon and evening.  During the winter, spring, fall and winter seasons.
